mapper.insert:
insert into t_mt_log(number, account_id, account, class_path, method_name, method_remark, arguments, level, error_msg, use_time, create_time) values(#{number},#{accountId},#{account},#{classPath},#{methodName},#{methodRemark},#{arguments},#{level},#{errorMsg},#{useTime},#{createTime})
select last_insert_id() as id
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.number, a.class_path, a.account, a.level, a.method_name, a.method_remark, a.arguments, a.error_msg, a.use_time, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS create_time FROM t_mt_log a ORDER BY a.number DESC limit #{index}, #{offset}
